DOC.brief_summary: This study seek compare outcomes anti-reflux surgery ( ARS ) correction low-grade vesicoureteral reflux ( VUR ) . It randomize control open-label trial conventional open anti-reflux technique versus endoscopic anti-reflux technique injection dextranomer/hyaluronic acid copolymer ( Deflux ) . Primary endpoint resolution VUR initial cystogram ARS . Secondary outcome include incidence postoperative UTI , resolution VUR 1-year cystogram ARS , surgical complication , quality life measure ARS .
